title: MST Access puts $6 a share valuation on Moelis
text:
MST Access reckons the market has missed Moelis Australia's transition away from capital markets to asset management and the stock should be trading at $6 a share.

MST Access senior research analyst Glen Wellham initiated coverage on the company this week and valued Moelis at $6 using a discounted cash flow with a weighted average cost of capital of 7.5 per cent.

Moelis shares last closed at $4.20, for a $654 million market capitalisation.

Moelis Australia boss Andrew Pridham. Michael Clayton-Jones

Welham told clients Moelis' asset management will "continue to grow strongly into the future" and dominate the company's earnings.

Moelis had $3.9 billion in assets under management as at June 30 and the division accounted for 98 per cent of group EBITDA and 70 per cent of revenue.
description: MST access has initiated coverage on Moelis Australia, valuing the asset manager at $6.00.
